info.repo-last-fail: ※ This site's last update: Failed to load
top.top-info:
Let's create Chibis with a score of over 300,000 in Promise of Wizard's training♪

What is "300,000"? 7 silver-frame traits of the same color = 150,000, and all 7*2 silver-frame traits for two colors = 300,000!
※ For more details, please see here (in Japanese)! Many thanks to the editors of "Promise of Wizard Wiki (Gamerch)" for compiling this wonderful information!

This is a two-color silver-frame party calculator made by a certain lazy sage aiming for a training score of 300,000 or more.

Please access this site from as large a screen as possible (PC, tablet, etc.)!

  • This site has limited mobile compatibility, so it's best viewed on a PC or tablet.
  • All functions run entirely in your browser, with no data saved on the backend
  • There's a language switch button at the top left. The translation may not be perfect, thank you for your understanding <3<3<3
top.h2-usage-content:
• First, go to the "Owned Cards" page, select cards, and generate the "Card Stock" string.
  • Next, go to the "Party Calculation" page, input the exported "Card Stock" string, and run the calculation.
top.card-annotation-note:
Currently, the Party Calculation and Party Prophecy pages mark the following types of cards:
  • Permanent
  • Festival/Carnival Limited: Anniversary, Birthday, Valentine (2/14), White Day (3/14), April Fool (4.1), Walpurgis (4.30–5.1), June Bride, Tanabata (7/7), Summer (August), Halloween (10/31)
  • Themed Limited: Sanrio Collab (A World Brimming with Friends), Caulis, Wizard Party, Sonatina (Duo Events)
  • Limited: Limited gacha cards or event reward cards; not included in permanent gacha
top.h2-caution-content:
Trial Run of New Feature: Every 5 days, all data — except for card acquisition methods and card icons — will be automatically synchronized from “Promise of Wizard Wiki (Gamerch)”. As a result, calculation results will also be updated automatically. The card's gacha types and the card icons will be updated manually at a later date.

This page uses images from coly Inc.'s "Promise of Wizard". Redistribution or distribution of the images is prohibited. ©coly

  • Card rarity: Only SSR and SR are supported. For details, see the "About" page.
  • Data source: A believing heart is a sage's magic, so why won't you believe me + manually supplemented by the developer
  • Card numbers: Based on the Promise of Wizard Wiki @ Fandom.
  • Update frequency: Always updated before Caulis events; otherwise updated irregularly.
  • Bug reports & feedback: If you find any mistakes or have any suggestions, please contact the developer
    • Contact info → see the "About" page.
top.content-below-may-not-translated: The following content is not planned to be translated. Thank you for your understanding.
cardmanager.description:
(2025/08/08) Recently fixed: Bug preventing correct selection when card number exceeds 337, missing info for cards 1145–1146. Thank you for the report.

Note: (The following is a detailed explanation. Click this line or the small triangle on the left to collapse/expand.)
  1. When pressing the "Show only SSR" button, all selected SR cards will be deselected. Please note. If you use this function, it's recommended to proceed assuming SRs are not considered.
  2. It is recommended to always save the string you use.
  3. Clicking a card title will jump to the corresponding Chinese WIKI page. Normally set to open in a new tab, but may vary depending on browser. Due to technical reasons, cards on this page cannot directly link to their detail pages in Promise of Wizard Wiki @ Fandom. Please access Card List by ID | Promise of Wizard Wiki @ Fandom and check the number manually (you can search with Ctrl+F [Command+F on Mac]).
disclaimer.text:
This tool is provided solely for personal research and learning purposes. Please use it in compliance with applicable laws. The developer bears no responsibility for how users use it.

This tool does not store or distribute copyright-protected content. If you believe this tool infringes rights, please contact us by email. Any relevant content will be promptly removed.

The developer waives all rights related to this tool (intellectual property rights, commercial benefits, future maintenance responsibility, etc.). The tool is provided "as is" with no guarantee of accuracy, completeness, or suitability. Use at your own risk.
contact-us:
kmbk.kr.dev[AT]outlook.jp

※ Feel free to contact us when you meet any problems.
calc-desc-line1: Enter a comma-separated list of owned card numbers in the textbox below and click the button to calculate.
calc-desc-line2: Cards you don't own (i.e., those you need to borrow) will be shown with a pink border.
calc-prophecy-line2: Cards you don't own (i.e., those you need to borrow) will be shown with a blue border.
calc-desc-line3:
Clicking a card image or its title in the result will jump to the corresponding Chinese WIKI page. Normally set to open in a new tab, but may vary depending on browser. Due to technical reasons, cards on this page cannot directly link to their detail pages in Promise of Wizard Wiki @ Fandom. Please access Card List by ID | Promise of Wizard Wiki @ Fandom and check the number manually (you can search with Ctrl+F [Command+F on Mac]).

Do not over-rely on the cached data of the input content on this page. It is HIGHLY recommended to save the string you use.
prophecy-special-note:
If no result is obtained on the "Party Calculation" page, refer to this result to plan your gacha pulls.
If a result is obtained on the "Card Calculation" page, this page will only display when 2 cards are missing. If there is no solution for when 1–2 cards are missing, the result for 3 missing cards will be shown instead.
This function is not fully tested, so please use it with caution. If there are any problems, please contact the developer.
calc-results-original-text: No calculation has been performed yet
prophcy-results-original-text: No prophecy(?) has been performed yet
alert.copy-fail: Failed to copy. Please copy manually
input.placeholder: Enter a list of card numbers. Example: 488,879,495,794,167,71
result.filter.label: Show only parties containing traits of
calc.error.invalid-input: Please enter a valid card number list separated by half-width commas
calc.error.load-failure: Calculation failed. There may be a network issue (solution unknown)
calc.no-result: No parties could be formed at this time… Try the "Party Prophecy"!
prophecy.no-result: Unable to prophesy… Collect mana stones and wait for the right time to gacha, my dear sage!
